RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHECK ME OUT broke in good order, showed the way up the backstretch along the inside, continued to set the pace turn, shook clear when straightened for home, held the runner up safe late under steady handling. DR. SNYDER broke forwardly, raced closest to the winner into the turn, fell back off that one in upper straight, closing the gap late while clearly second best. ARKANSAS ZONG within striking distance off the inside, three wide through the turn, came back for the show the final furlong while not a threat to the top two. RED ON THE HEAD in the second flight while also racing off the inside, closest to the top two past the furlong maker, outfinished for the show spot while also not a threat to that pair late. STRUTTIN APRIORITY off a step slow, raced back, moved off the inside, swung five wide into the lane when improving, flattened out a bit late to finish up best of the others. MR LEO AND JOSE in mid pack early well out in the course, five wide into the turn, four wide exiting, roused, came up empty for the stretch run. FLASHY LOVER four wide into the turn when in the second group, came three wide for the drive, failed to make an impact in the run to the wire. LOVELY SASSICAIA made little impact while racing three wide. ALL COUNTRY broke back and failed to menace. ANOTHER FINAL hesitated at the break to spot the field a couple of lengths, remained back. FLATTERSOLUTION main body early, was finished after three furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Another Final
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated break, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Check Me Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in good order, pace inside, shook clear, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Struttin Apriority
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, raced back, swung 5w into lane, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Flattersolution
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, finished after three furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: All Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Red On the Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, outkicked for the show

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Snyder
ENTRY.OWNER: Boutte Lynne M and Epstein Ellen
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased off rail, coming steadily late

ENTRY.NAME: Arkansas Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced 3w, came back show

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Leo and Jose
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack and outside, 5-4w turn, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Sassicaia
ENTRY.COMMENT: made little impact 3w

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OLDER AND WISER last to leave, void of early foot, came five wide out of the turn, set down, closed willingly, late bid, edged clear final strides. WILLIAM GUSTAVO with the early pace three wide, between foes into the turn, dueled out of the bend closest to but not on the rail, drifted out a bit past midstretch stretch to brush with F T W SLAM, could not contain the winner late, narrowly saved the show. OURPERFECTPRINCE behind the pace while off the inside, four wide turning for home, late bid to miss the second spot while gaining the nod for the show. F T W SLAM prompted the issue early in the four path up the backstretch, advanced to challenge turn, dueled outside the runner up into the stretch, brushed by that one approaching the furlong marker, weakened late from between horses. PRINCE OF GLORY vied early while between horses, fell back through the turn, two path into the stretch, came again late while closest to the rail of the first flight. GOLDUSTER underwent a shoe repair in the paddock, broke in good order, fell back to race in mid pack, went one paced through the lane in lacking a closing kick. HULLINAHURRY failed to menace in remaining back. ROLL ON OUT broke back, trailed most of the way and was never a threat. ZAICI flashed brief speed in vying for the advantage early, stopped, jogged in well back. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE RUN THROUGH MIDSTRETCH, THE RESULT WAS ALLOWED TO STAND.

ENTRY.NAME: Zaici
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed inside, stopped, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Hullinahurry
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace in remaining back

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early between foes, fell back turn, coming again late

ENTRY.NAME: Older and Wiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, back, 5w into lane, late bid, clear

ENTRY.NAME: William Gustavo
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace 3w, stretch duel, slight drift,brush,saved 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Golduster
ENTRY.COMMENT: shoe repair paddock, one paced, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ourperfectprince
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind the pace, 4w into lane, missed 2nd,nod 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: F T W Slam
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted early 4w, dueled upper stretch,brushed,weakened btwn

ENTRY.NAME: Roll On Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, trailed much of way, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT OIL steadied exiting the chute in some traffic, trailed into the turn well out in the strip, four to five wide into the lane, advanced, late surge to be up at the wire while remaining outside. OUT MAKING TREBLE underwent a shoe repair in the paddock, moved up to contest the pace soon after the start, set or forced the pace for a half, drew clear into the stretch, extended that advantage past the furlong marker but could not contain the winner late, remained well clear for the second spot. CLEVER PRINCE steadied slightly in some traffic inside the winner with three furlongs to run, three wide through the turn, finished up best of the rest. ADMIRAL AFLEET lacked speed, continued to lag in trailing early in the turn, saved ground into the stretch and improved position up the inside, not enough late for the show. LOST GOLD last away, remained back to prove never dangerous. CATINANDSCATIN forwardly placed in the run up the backstretch, lodged a brief bid far turn, gave way in the drive. DOUBLE BOGEY flashed some brief speed to show the way early, began a steady retreat before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Admiral Afleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, improved up rail

ENTRY.NAME: Lost Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Out Making Treble
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced pace four a half, clear upper, could not last

ENTRY.NAME: Clever Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight steady 3/4, 3w turn, finished best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Oil
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied 3/4, fell back, 4-5w into lane, late surge, up

ENTRY.NAME: Catinandscatin
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, bid far turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Double Bogey
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, steady fade

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 5F Turf CR: 76. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIZ THE BIG ONE broke on top, dueled up the backstretch off the inside, disposed of that rival early in the turn just as a second foe was mounting a challenged on the outside, took care of that rival into the lane, clear past the furlong marker, enough left late to hold off the runner up. GYPSY'S SOULMATE back off the pace, moved out a bit, came three to four wide for the drive, was coming late while clearly second best. JAMAICAN ME lacked early foot toward the inside for three furlongs, angled out to be four wide into the stretch, finished willingly while too late for the top two at the wire. FLASHY BOY forwardly placed early outside, lodged a three wide bid midway on the turn, failed to sustain that effort through the stretch. MUSTAFA one paced while racing outside, four to five wide into the stretch, lacked a closing kick. B W P SPIRIT lacked speed four three furlongs, improved a bit in the drive without posing a serious threat. TOTALLY ADDICTED dwelt at the start, trailed for three furlongs, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. BARSINVIEW dueled up front inside the winner for a quarter and began to give way, continued to weaken through the stretch. CLASSIC RED RACER within striking distance early off the rail, backed up through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: B W P Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Norman, Mark and Norman Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, improved a bit, never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Gypsy's Soulmate
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace inside, 3-4w into lane, coming late

ENTRY.NAME: Totally Addicted
ENTRY.COMMENT: dwelt start, trailed, passed couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Jamaican Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, angled 4w into stretch, willingly, too late

ENTRY.NAME: Barsinview
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Red Racer
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz the Big One
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying B Ranch Cattle Company LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, dueled backstretch, turned back bid, clear, held

ENTRY.NAME: Mustafa
ENTRY.OWNER: Highfield Investment Group Inc and Appleyard Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced outside, 5w into lane, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, bid turn, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 10, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 10, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLASHY PREMO last away, outrun for six furlongs, three wide into the lane, shifted out when straightened for home, closed with good resolve to be up in the final strides. BODE'S LIGHT chased the early leader, advanced and challenged into the far turn, shook off that one with less a furlong remaining, led late, nailed at the wire. FLIT N FLOT TIME settled off the pace and the inside, three wide into the lane, rallied with the winner late, flattened out a bit late, best of rest while between the top two at the wire. HERE COMES MAGIC forwardly placed, between horses into the lane, lacked a closing punch. APPLEWOOD off the pace while three wide through the first turn, moved inside and saved ground through the second bend, went evenly through the lane in lacking a closing kick. SCREENPLAY broke well from between horses, clear through the first turn when settled the pace, joined by the runner up to duel through the second bend, gave way in the drive. LIAM SKYE broke back, failed to menace. MATH MAN lacked speed and was not involved. FORT BONZ restless in the gate, raced in mid pack and four wide through the first turn, was finished after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Liam Skye
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, lacked punch stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Math Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, not involved

ENTRY.NAME: Screenplay
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well btwn, cleared early, dueled 2nd,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Bode's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, bid, dueled, led late, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Applewood
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3w 1st turn, dropped inside, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Premo
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, outrun for 3/4, steered out, good resolve late widest

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Cynthia Hedge Morrell & Arthur Anthony Morrell

ENTRY.NAME: Flit N Flot Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace and the inside,3w, late run,not enuf btwn

ENTRY.NAME: Fort Bonz
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, 4w first turn, finished after half

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FINISHWHATUSTARTED broke alertly, cleared to the inside when showing the way up the backstretch, rated into the turn, extended advantage through upper stretch, enough left to last. CHERRY STAR back off the pace and the inside, got out a bit when advancing five wide out of the turn, lost considerable ground to the winner as a result, rapidly getting to that one with a late burst. ARMS APRIORITY moved up inside to race in a forward position, proved no match for the top two in the drive, comfortably held the show. CAT B CAUSE lacked early foot, raced four wide out of the turn, improved position with some mild late interest, no threat to the top three. BRIDLED UP turned in a one paced effort while racing toward the inside. BRIGHTNMORNINGSTAR void of speed, was six wide out of the turn, improved a bit down the middle of the strip without posing a serious threat. OUR CLOVER GAL chased the winner early off the inside, began to weaken by late in the turn. GLAMOROUS STAR last to leave, lacked speed, made little impact downt htre lane. BYE BYE BIG BABY in the second flight early, faded. CHICKIETOWN STAR chased the winner for a half outside, gave way through the stretch. ANGEL AND ME remained always back.

ENTRY.NAME: Glamorous Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed,little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Arms Apriority
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up inside, forward, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Cat B Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 4w into lane, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Angel and Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained always back

ENTRY.NAME: Bridled Up
ENTRY.OWNER: Flores, Jesse Ray, Flores, Gerald and Boudreaux, Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced toward rail

ENTRY.NAME: Bye Bye Big Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Our Clover Gal
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Cherry Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, got out a bit when advancing 5w, coming late

ENTRY.NAME: Brightnmorningstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 6w exiting the turn, improved a bit midtrack

ENTRY.NAME: Finishwhatustarted
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly,cleared toward inside,rated turn,well clear, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Chickietown Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, gave way stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIKE THIS broke well, set the pace while in hand, continued to rate through the turn, drew off through the lane, won geared down and ridden out. HEZA SEXY ZONG within striking distance while racing outside, proved no match for the winner in the drive, clear for the place. APRIORITY AVENGER away in good order, raced within striking distance for a half, also proved no match for the winner nor could he contain the runner up through the stretch. GRAY DANE off the early pace and the inside, improved position with some mild late interest. CATCH ME T last away, void of speed in trailing for over a half, improved with some belated interest up the inside. MALAKI EMPIRE off the pace well out in the strip early, four wide through the turn, failed to respond when roused for the drive. POPPA MAGIC in mid pack for a half, also came up empty for the stretch run. BEAUDEAN fell back, failed to rally. SHAWN'S SOLVING closest to the winner for four furlongs, faltered through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Catch Me T
ENTRY.OWNER: Angelle Glenn M and Tamporello Glenn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, belatedly inside

ENTRY.NAME: Beaudean
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Poppa Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Like This
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, pace, rated, drew off, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Avenger
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, lacked losing kick, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Shawn's Solving
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for a half, faltered stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Dane
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, modest late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Malaki Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace, 4w turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Sexy Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance outside, no match, clear 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACE. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5 0,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOOSIER outrun in the early going, moved closer under modest encouragement while four wide through the turn, roused when straightened for home, closed with good energy to win going away at the end. HARDLY ABLE broke on top, set the pace toward the inside, shook well clear by midstretch, proved no match for the winner late while holding sway for the place. MO CREDO lacked early foot well out in the strip, five wide through the turn, rallied for the show while also closing the gap on the runner up. ZINGING BAYOU last away, trailed for a half, found best stride too late through traffic. HARPES HILL chased the runner up for a half, had little left for the stretch run. TWOFEXUSNEXUS forwardly placed early, began to fall back before a half. GUTZY in the second flight for four furlongs, gave way through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Twofexusnexus
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Zinging Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed for half, stride late thru traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Gutzy
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Hardly Able
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace toward inside, clear, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Hoosier
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, closer 4w late turn, roused, going away end

ENTRY.NAME: Harpes Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for a half, little left stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Credo
ENTRY.OWNER: Thompson Racing LLC (Stephen Thompson) and OM Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 5w turn, rallied, in time show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZIPPING MOLLY away in good order, prompted the early leader, took over far turn, drew out upper stretch, maintained a comfortable advantage to the wire under steady handling. STARSHIP NOLA back off the pace toward the inside, angled out four wide turning for home, finished up willingly to be well clear for the place while not a match for the winner. CHARMING KAT settled in mid pack, moved closer four wide turning for home, along for the show. GYPSY JACKPOT in the second flight while racing outside, moved closer through the turn, flattened out in the drive. MINT JULIUS back off the pace and the inside, improved slightly outside, never dangerous. LAKE BALI moved closer through the turn, vied for the second spot past the furlong marker, faltered. SHEEZA PRIORITY broke back and never menaced. SILK NOT SATIN broke on top, set the early pace, gave way when headed far turn. BON CHANCE BET in the second flight, chased through the turn, caved in when the real running began the head of the lane. PUMP IT broke back, sluggish, fell far back, distanced after losing contact with the field.

ENTRY.NAME: Pump It
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, sluggish, distanced

ENTRY.NAME: Charming Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in mid pack, closer 4w late turn, along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Silk Not Satin
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, early pace, gave way when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: closer turn, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Nola
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, angled 4w into lane, willingly, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Zipping Molly
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, prompted, took over, clear, steady handling

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.

ENTRY.NAME: Sheeza Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back and never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Chance Bet
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, chased turn, caved in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Gypsy Jackpot
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, closer turn, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Mint Julius
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, improved slightly
